results.title: Fern the Red Deer (Captioned)
results.brief_description: A marvellous adventure story, filmed on location in remote Exmoor, about an abandoned deer calf. The deer calf forms a bond with two young children and together they fight for the wild deer’s survival. Rated: G

results.title: Female vampire = La Comtesse noire [DVD] (E)
results.creator_credit: Jesus Franco, Marius Lesoeur, Brux International Picture and Films Marc
results.brief_description: This influential erotic horror film, directed by Jesus Franco, established the reputation of erotic actress and horror icon, Lina Romay. In this unabashed performance she plays Countess Iriana of Karlstein, a mute vampire who resides on a remote island, feeding off men and women to satiate her desire to literally suck the life out of her lovers. Iriana faces a new challenge when she meets a poet who believes himself destined to become her lover and, like her, immortal. Simultaneously a scientist Dr. Roberts and his colleague, Dr. Orlof, become aware that a vampire is at work and set about finding him or her. “Female vampire” has a dream-like quality, and similar to “Vampyros Lesbos”, has achieved cult status amid horror buffs. Various cuts of this film exist; this version favours the sexuality of the characters over the more graphic horror elements. The deleted scenes in special features contains scenes of a more bloody nature. Features excessive nudity, and scenes of masturbation and oral sex that are quite explicit. Cast includes Jack Taylor, Alice Arno, Monica Swinn. This film is also known under the following titles: Bare Breasted Countess, Erotikill, Erotikiller and The Loves of Irina. Please note, this is the dubbed English language version.

results.title: Fat of the land
results.creator_credit: Edmond Levy, Medcom and Searle Educational Systems
results.brief_description: Documentary on obesity, its causes and effects. Psychiatrists suggest that over-eating is a form of emotional disorder leading to addiction and that in the United States in particular, food has become symbolic as a state of well-being. It appears that children are actually encouraged to over-eat leading to difficulties in adult life to break the habit. The program’s main aim is to educate in the area of health and nutrition.

results.title: Family matters
results.creator_credit: Robert Van der Vvyer and Jenny Drew
results.brief_description: The twelve months after the first baby arrives can be a crucial time in a couple’s relationship. The twosome becomes a threesome, and much of a couple’s time and energy is directed towards caregiving, with possible misunderstandings and resentments occurring if each partner does not understand how the other is feeling.

results.title: Factory management: the search for savings
results.brief_description: Explains how to locate and reduce product costs during design, purchasing and manufacturing. It demonstrates how personnel can apply value engineering and analysis principles to cut costs.

results.title: Faces in a crowd
results.creator_credit: Roger Dunton, David Powell and Abacus Documentaries
results.brief_description: Looks at the city of London and shows how the Port and the city are complementary, mutually supporting a vast trading complex. This relationship is largely revealed in this film in terms of people - working people - in the markets, for which the city is justly famous.

results.title: Face value
results.brief_description: Explores the lives of three facially disfigured individuals in a sensitive and moving series of interviews. Discusses the meaning of beauty, the value of physical appearances in society and the importance of every human being.

results.title: Explore Australia 1997 (PC & MAC)
results.brief_description: Explore Australia 1997 is a cyber guide for the desktop traveller, allowing the user to explore some of Australia’s top tourist destinations without leaving the comforts of home. Search thousands of towns, explore big city highlights, obtain information on Australia’s best national parks, and research accommodation Australia-wide. Easy to use, and can be linked to a companion website packed with additional information.
